procedures.title: Documents Checklist
procedures.description: Comprehensive checklist for seafarer documentation verification before joining vessel

steps.title: Verify SIRB (Seafarer's Identification Record Book)
steps.description: Check authenticity and no alterations

steps.title: Verify Passport
steps.description: Valid passport with minimum 6 months validity

steps.title: Verify STCW Certificates
steps.description: All required STCW95 certificates current and valid

steps.title: Verify Medical Certificate
steps.description: Valid ICSFL medical examination certificate

steps.title: Verify Visa
steps.description: Valid visa for flag state and port states

steps.title: Verify Training Certificates
steps.description: GMDSS, Fire Safety, First Aid, Safety Training certificates as per company requirements

steps.title: Verify Flag State Requirements
steps.description: Additional certificates per vessel flag state

steps.title: Verify Criminal Record Clearance
steps.description: Police clearance or equivalent

procedures.title: Application for Employment
procedures.description: Standard application form for seafarer employment

steps.title: Complete Application Form
steps.description: Fill in personal details, experience, qualifications

steps.title: Submit Required Documents
steps.description: Attach all supporting documents per checklist

steps.title: Document Screening
steps.description: Initial screening for document completeness

steps.title: Schedule Interview
steps.description: Arrange interview with Expert Staff

steps.title: Conduct Interview
steps.description: Professional interview by qualified Expert Staff

steps.title: Assess Language Proficiency
steps.description: Evaluate English communication skills (Active speaking/writing)

steps.title: Assess Technical Competence
steps.description: Verify technical knowledge relevant to position

steps.title: Document Interview Result
steps.description: Record assessment and recommendation

steps.title: Make Recommendation
steps.description: Approve, Conditional Approval, or Reject

steps.title: Verify All Documents Updated
steps.description: Ensure all certificates and documents current

steps.title: Conduct Medical Check
steps.description: Final health assessment before departure

steps.title: Provide Pre-Joining Brief
steps.description: Brief on vessel operation, company policies, safety procedures

steps.title: Review Employment Contract
steps.description: Ensure seafarer understands contract terms and conditions

steps.title: Arrange Travel
steps.description: Book flights and arrange travel logistics

steps.title: Conduct Safety Training
steps.description: Company-specific safety and security training

steps.title: Final Sign-Off
steps.description: Seafarer confirmation ready for deployment

steps.title: Conduct De-Briefing Interview
steps.description: Interview seafarer upon return

steps.title: Collect Feedback
steps.description: Document seafarer's experience and suggestions

steps.title: Identify Issues
steps.description: Note any problems or concerns raised

steps.title: Plan Follow-up
steps.description: Arrange any necessary medical or support services

steps.title: Receive Evaluation from Vessel
steps.description: Collect performance report from Master/Management Company

steps.title: Review Evaluation
steps.description: Expert Staff reviews report

steps.title: Identify Training Needs
steps.description: Determine any remedial training needed

steps.title: Document Results
steps.description: Record evaluation in seafarer file

steps.title: Plan Development
steps.description: Suggest training for promotion or skill enhancement

procedures.title: Contract of Employment
procedures.description: Employment contract between company and seafarer

steps.title: Prepare Contract
steps.description: Generate contract per principal requirements and MLC 2006

steps.title: Review with Seafarer
steps.description: Explain all terms clearly, obtain understanding

steps.title: Obtain Signatures
steps.description: Both parties sign contract

steps.title: Provide Copy
steps.description: Give signed copy to seafarer

steps.title: File Record
steps.description: Maintain signed copy in personnel file

procedures.title: Notice of Crew On&Off-Signing
procedures.description: Official notice of crew sign-on and sign-off dates

steps.title: Confirm Sign-On Date
steps.description: Finalize crew joining date with vessel

steps.title: Issue Sign-On Notice
steps.description: Notify seafarer of exact joining date/place/vessel

steps.title: Confirm Sign-Off Schedule
steps.description: Plan crew relief and replacement

steps.title: Issue Sign-Off Notice
steps.description: Notify seafarer of planned sign-off date

steps.title: Maintain Records
steps.description: Document all sign-on/off dates for compliance
